section.item: Flowers design © 2009 Privacy Policy
XXXXTHE BEST SERVICES AND ADVICE FOR YOU

texts.pageText:
Have a special occasion to plan for? Why not serve up a tier of decadent cupcakes. Forbidden Cupcakes offers a variety of flavours to suit every celebration. If you can't see it, contact us for a friendly discussion.

Our delicious cupcakes are made using only the finest ingredients and baked fresh for your party. So come on in and browse through our world of Forbidden Cupcakes.

Classic Cupcakes


Classic Vanilla
Light vanilla sponge with classic vanilla buttercream topping

Wanna Date?
Traditional sticky date recipe with real date chunks and decadent butterscotch topping

Raspberry Kiss
Raspberry fruit filled sponge topped with finger licking cream cheese frosting

Choco-holic
Chocolate muddy goodness topped with smooth chocolate buttercream

Choc Berry
Chocolate mud base infused with real raspberry fruit topped with raspberry buttercream

On Cloud 9
Dense, milky, white chocolate mud topped with smooth, white chocolate buttercream

White Berry Blush
White chocolate mud infused with real raspberry fruit topped with raspberry buttercream

Lemon Bliss
Refreshing lemon sponge complimented by lemon infused buttercream

Fruity Pash
Light passionfruit sponge topped with passionfruit infused buttercream

Banana-rama
Banana cake base topped with fluffy vanilla buttercream

Nuts about you
Vanilla sponge with chunks of crunchy peanuts, topped with real peanut butter buttercream

Choc Mint Crisp
Chocolate mud base with mint infused buttercream sprinkled with peppermint chards

Premium Flavours


Death by Chocolate
Thick rich chocolate brownie base with nutella frosting – not for the faint hearted

Oozy Caramel Crunch
Choc sponge with think rich caramel filling topped with chocolate buttercream and honeycomb

Choc Mousse
Chocolate sponge with chocolate mousse filling topped with chocolate buttercream

Lemon Meringue
Light lemon sponge with lemon cured filling topped with fluffy vanilla meringue


We also specialise in tiered wedding cakes. Please contact us for a professional consultation and quote. We’d love to hear your ideas on how to make this masterpiece uniquely yours.

How much notice do you require for an order?
Two days notice is required for a cupcake order. We encourage you to notify us as soon as possible for wedding orders so we can tentatively save the date.

How do I store my cupcakes?
Forbidden Cupcakes prides itself in using the finest ingredients. As no preservatives are used in our recipes our cupcakes can be kept fresh for up to 3 days in an air tight container. Keep at room temperature, do not refrigerate.

Where are you located?
Forbidden Cupcakes is situated in a Bayside suburb. Pick up of orders can be arranged by appointment. Similarly, if you wish to have a face to face consultation please feel free to contact Pau-Ling on 0432 688 315 to arrange a suitable time.

What payment options are there?
Orders greater than $200 require 50% deposit upon booking with the remaining 50% due one week prior to delivery.
You can pay using the following methods;
1. Cash
2. Electronic Transfer

Why can’t I order a dozen of mixed flavours?
Forbidden Cupcakes are baked fresh to order, we do not hold stock on premises to accommodate mixed orders. One dozen is the minimum order for one standard flavour (or 24 minis).

Can you create custom designs and flavours?
Yes, we are always up for the challenge. Please contact us to discuss your specific requests.

Are your cupcakes gluten free or allergen free?
Our recipes have been perfected using the finest ingredients to achieve delicious taste, texture and look. Our products include diary, eggs, wheat and may include traces of nuts.

Can you deliver my order as a present?
Absolutely! Like flowers, we can deliver to your special someone on Valentines Day, Birthdays, Anniversaries etc.
